name: Ext_R4_CarePlan_ac_reference
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.CarePlan.activity.reference for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents CarePlan.activity.reference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Activity details defined in specific resource
element.definition: The details of the proposed activity represented in a specific resource.
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.reference` maps to R5 `CarePlan.activity.plannedActivityReference`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestGroup)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
